title: Brand New Chic In Uptown! 2 MONTHS FREE!!
posting_body: Chic intimate community provides an intimate haven of luxury rental apartments conveniently secluded mere steps away from the dynamic pulse of Uptown life.
Breathtaking views of downtown Dallas, astonishing design, unrivaled service and amenities — every element has been considered.
Flourish in the heart of Uptown.
Centrally located in Uptown Dallas with walkable access to area restaurants, West Village shopping center and the nearby McKinney Avenue Trolley
Top-level amenities include the dramatic rooftop lounge with views of the downtown Dallas skyline.
Entertain guests in the clubroom with views of the pool, a suspended fireplace, full kitchen, billiards and shuffleboard.
Or take a relaxing dip and soak up some sun in the inviting swimming pool with tanning ledge, grilling areas and fire table.
Maintain your active lifestyle in the fitness studio with strength and cardio equipment, yoga and spin cycle studio.
Please Call Desiree with DASH Realty
